code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import'./MorningPages.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MorningPages=()=>{const history=useHistory();const[timer,setTimer]=useState(0);const handleTimerChange=e=>{setTimer(e.target.value);};const handleDone=()=>{history.push('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"activity-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Morning Pages"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"timer-setup",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Set Timer:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:timer,onChange:handleTimerChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>alert("Timer set for ".concat(timer," minutes")),children:"Start"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-controls",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDone,children:"Done for Today"})})]});};export default MorningPages;
